products.name: Broderick Glass-Top Corner Desk
products.shortDescription: The Broderick glass-top desk is a picture of functionality and style. With room for keyboard and mouse, this will be a great addition to your home office. The durable metal construction adds a great modern touch with the rich finish.

products.name: T-Fal Admire 9-Piece Cookware Set (A743S974) - Aluminum
products.shortDescription: Nothing makes cooking more enjoyable than sturdy, easy-to-clean cookware. T-fal's Admire nine-piece cookware set features non-stick coating and Thermo-Spot technology that lets you know when the pan is ready for use. This set is oven and dishwasher safe, making it ideal for everyday cooking.

products.name: Fresno Double Futon - Black
products.shortDescription: This Fresno futon features thick, padded cushions to help you relax and enjoy your living space. Perfect for movie nights or having guests over, the sofa can easily transition to a futon. With the sleek lines, and smooth, supple fabric, this will quickly become your favourite space to unwind.

products.name: Murphy Mesh Mid-Back Task Chair - Black
products.shortDescription: This contemporary styled office chair incorporates comfort and style with the plush cushions and uniquely flared back. Featuring high-fashion studs, this will be a spunky addition to any work space or home office.

products.name: Zwilling J.A. Henckels Twin Gourmet Knife Block - 10 Piece Set
products.shortDescription: Have all you need to be the master chef in your kitchen with this 10 piece Twin Gourmet knife block set from the prestigious Zwilling J.A. Henckels. Featuring NO STAIN stainless steel, and ice-hardened blades, you will be cutting ingredients with finite precision. From paring to chef's knife, cooking will never be the same again.

products.name: iSmart Alarm Home Security System (iSA3)
products.shortDescription: Keep the precious people and items in your life safe and sound with the iSmart Alarm Home Security System. This self-controlled, wireless system uses your smartphone to remotely arm, disarm and monitor safety features, alerting all family members via text, phone call, push notification and email the moment there a breach in security.

products.name: Cuisinart 12-Piece Cookware Set (77-12C) - Stainless Steel
products.shortDescription: Cook like a gourmet chef with this 12-piece cookware set from Cuisinart. This set has everything you need to make an amazing meal, including saucepans, saut√© pan, Dutch oven and skillets. The durable, easy-to-clean stainless steel design is stylish and built to meet the demands of any kitchen. This set is dishwasher, oven, broiler and freezer safe.

products.name: Shiloh Accent Chair - Black
products.shortDescription: Spend hours seated in style and comfort on this Shiloh accent chair, offering a well-cushioned back and padded arm rests. Take a moment to relax and put up your feet on the footrest while you swivel.

products.name: Simple Sleep Queen Platform Bed - Espresso
products.shortDescription: This Espresso Queen Platform Bed from Simple Sleep will appeal to your taste for the contemporary. Not only will it look good in your bedroom, but it's designed to minimize motion transfer, so even if your partner can't stop tossing and turning, you'll still get a good night's sleep.

products.name: T-Fal Professional 10.2" Pan (E8830554)
products.shortDescription: Experience the joy of cooking with this T-fal Professional frying pan. It's perfect for cooking low-fat meals, and includes a heat indicator that alerts you when the pan achieves the perfect cooking temperature. You'll also enjoy a safe, comfortable grip with the silicone handle, and fast and easy clean-up, thanks to a non-stick exterior.

products.name: Daphne Chaise Lounge - Brown
products.shortDescription: Featuring intricate detail to enhance the plush padding, the Daphne chair is a beautiful design of chic and comfort. The tufted cushions are complemented by the intricate stitching, and you'll rest comfortably against the lush fabric.

products.name: Montecito Bonded High-Back Manager & Executive Chair - Black
products.shortDescription: You'll be ready to tackle any work day with this high-back Montecello office chair. The plush and supportive padded seating is upholstered with smooth supple material for maximum comfort. Featuring sleek chrome arms and legs, this will be a sophisticated addition to any office space.

products.name: Erica Accent Chair - Teal
products.shortDescription: Spend hours seated in style and comfort on this trendy Erica chair. It offers plush padding, curved arms and midsized back support so you can relax while taking a break from typing or writing, or while away the time reading your favourite novel. The seat boasts an attractive sharp-cornered design.

products.name: CorLiving Curved Form Fitting Adjustable Bar Stools - 2 Pack - Black
products.shortDescription: These CorLiving bar stools will add a futuristic touch to any living space. Each bar stool features a padded swan-style two-piece seat upholstered in soft leatherette, as well as a chrome base and leg support. The stool height is adjustable to fit your bar or table.

products.name: 8-Piece Milan Queen Bedroom Set - Espresso
products.shortDescription: The Milan bedroom suite is a masterpiece collection of traditional elegance and contemporary characteristics. Featuring unique designs of faux leather, contoured curves and rich espresso finish tying this eight piece collection together, this is a bedroom set to be proud of.  It includes a chest, 2 nightstands, dresser, mirror, and bedframe, all finished in a rich espresso veneer for an added feeling of warmth and vibrancy.

products.name: Erica Accent Chair - Charcoal
products.shortDescription: The Erica chair is a stately mid-back sized chair that will make you feel regal once you sit down. With bold, rich coloured fabric that's lined with elegant trim, this will quickly become your personal relaxing throne. The sharp corners and sleek curves offer a touch of contemporary style that will embolden any d√©cor.

products.name: Daphne Chaise Lounge - White
products.shortDescription: Featuring intricate detail to enhance the plush padding, the Daphne chair is a beautiful design of chic and comfort. The tufted cushions are complemented by the intricate stitching, and you'll rest comfortably against the lush fabric.

products.name: Contemporary Bonded Leather Sectional - Black
products.shortDescription: Perfect for entertaining or taking an afternoon nap, this Monarch sectional sofa is the perfect blend of comfort and style. It features a soft, luxurious bonded leather material, strong wood frame and modern design that looks great in any space.

products.name: Mesh Back Contemporary Office Chair - Black
products.shortDescription: Sit comfortably as you take care of business in this Etzia office chair. It boasts a black mesh design, polyurethane seating, and features a hydraulic lift that can be adjusted to suit your comfort.

products.name: D-Link HD Pan & Tilt Day/Night Network Camera (DCS-5222L/CA) - White
products.shortDescription: Keep an eye on your home, even when you're not there, with the D-Link HD Pan & Tilt Day/Night Network Camera. No matter where you are, you'll enjoy access to your property, pets, and even your children in 720p clarity. It also allows you remote access via web browser, iPhone, iPad, Android, and Windows Phone 8 apps.

products.name: 8-Piece Davis Queen Bedroom Set - Cherry
products.shortDescription: Find splendor and luxury with the Davis bedroom collection. Offering traditional appeal with shaped bun feet, and silver finished details, there's also modern sophistication in the strong lines and bold panels in the headboard and footboard. This eight piece set has a queen size headboard, footboard, rails, mirror, dresser, two nightstands, and chest.

products.name: Erica Accent Chair - Natural
products.shortDescription: Who said your office can't be fun? The Erica office chair is a picture of fashion and trendiness. With an assortment of colours and fabric, you can personalize your workspace with your own unique taste and style. Featuring plush padding, and sleek curved arms, this is your statement piece to stand out and be known.

products.name: Paderno Culina 12-Piece Stainless Steel Cookware Set
products.shortDescription: Cook up a storm with this Paderno Culino stainless steel 12-piece set. It includes 2 saucepans, 2 casserole pans, a stock pot, and 2 frying pans that feature a fast heat conducting base, non-stick coating, and ergonomically welded handles.

products.name: Sealy Posturepedic PROBACK Titanium Queen Plush Pillow Top Mattress (502183-51)
products.shortDescription: Doze into comfort on the Sealy Posturepedic PROBACK Titanium Plush Pillow Top Mattress. Featuring a titanium-alloy-infused innerspring and PROBACK CoreSupport Center, this mattress provides superior support to help you sleep soundly. It also relieves pressure points and minimizes motion transfer so you can sleep undisturbed with less tossing and turning.

products.name: Dropcam Pro Wireless Video Monitor Camera (DCAM-002-0CA) - Black
products.shortDescription: Whether you want to peer in on the kids from the office or chat with your cat from campus, you can do it all with Dropcam Pro. This cloud-based WiFi video monitoring service records crisp Full HD video day and night, and lets you watch what's going on from your computer or mobile device. With the two-way talk feature, you can say "hi" to the kids or pets wherever you are.

products.name: ObusForme 4-in-1 Cervical Pillow (PL-CMB-01) - White/Tan
products.shortDescription: Wake up ready and refreshed with the ObusForme 4-in-1 Cervical pillow. It enables four comfortable sleeping options and as well as personalized support. The surface texture encourages air circulation, reduces moisture build-up, and helps reduce pressure points, and the ergonomic design helps relieve neck pain and shoulder tension.

products.name: Netatmo Weather Station (NWS01-US)
products.shortDescription: Better understand your environment, indoors and outdoors, with the Netatmo NWS01-US Weather Station. This system features indoor and outdoor modules that gather information on temperature, humidity, air quality, CO2 level, noise pollution, barometric pressure and more that you can access quickly and easily from your smartphone.

products.name: Nest Learning Thermostat (T200477)
products.shortDescription: Help keep your home cozy and energy efficient with the Nest Learning Thermostat. This innovative thermostat learns your ideal temperatures based on your adjustments and programs itself in about a week. It helps keep your energy bills down by turning down the temperature when you're gone. When connected to WiFi, you can control Nest from your smartphone, tablet or laptop, wherever you are.

products.name: Simple Sleep Queen Platform Bed With Uphostered Headboard - Charcoal
products.shortDescription: The Taylor Platform Bed from Simple Sleep will appeal to your taste for the contemporary. It features a rich padded charcoal headboard with tufted upholstery that will fit nicely in your bedroom d√©cor, and a centre support bar system that offers strength and durability.

products.name: Lorex 7" LCD Home Camera Security System (LW1742)
products.shortDescription: Keep eyes on your prized properties to keep both your loved ones and your belongings secure. The Lorex LW1742 wireless 2-camera security system keeps two cameras on guard duty day and night and from season to season, sending footage and motion detection alerts to your devices so you can keep your peace of mind, even away from home.

products.name: Erica Accent Chair - Red
products.shortDescription: The Erica chair is a stately mid-back sized chair that will make you feel regal once you sit down. With bold, rich coloured fabric that's lined with elegant trim, this will quickly become your personal relaxing throne. The sharp corners and sleek curves offer a touch of contemporary style that will embolden any d√©cor.

products.name: D-Link Wireless-N Wireless Camera (DCS-942L)
products.shortDescription: Perfect for your home or office, this D-Link wireless camera comes with everything you need for smart surveillance. The mydlink service lets you view what's happening on your camera over the Internet or from your smartphone, while an easy setup has you monitoring your space in no time.
